report_title: Air Duct Cleaning Services Industry Report
executive_summary: Air duct cleaning companies provide services necessary for the upkeep of homes, commercial buildings and other structures. Revenue has been volatile during the current period because of the economic effects of the pandemic and fluctuating interest rates.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: COVID-19 Halts Downstream Demand for the Industry's Services
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: When the pandemic hit, state and local governments closed businesses and enforced stringent social distancing measures.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Revenue Soared During the Pandemic Recovery as Corporate Profit Skyrocketed
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: As social distancing measures and other pandemic-era restrictions were relaxed or eliminated, consumers flocked back to retailers, restaurants and venues holding major events.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Rising Interest Rates Have Significantly Inhibited Revenue From Households
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: As inflation has risen drastically, the Federal Reserve has increased interest rates.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: STABLE ECONOMIC CONDITIONS WILL AID REVENUE GROWTH
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Despite current challenges, the US economy is expected to grow steadily during the outlook period.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: MODERATING INTEREST RATES WILL RESCUE DEMAND FROM THE RESIDENTIAL SECTOR
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: As inflation is anticipated to decline in the near future, the Federal Reserve is likely to bring the cost of borrowing back down slightly.

industry_definition: Companies in this industry provide air duct cleaning services to buildings and dwellings.

negative_impact_factors: Barriers To Entry Level: low - increasing

opportunities: High Performance Drivers: Per capita disposable income

key_trends: Volatility has been high during the current period.
The industry will expand steadily during the outlook period.

market_segmentation.segment_description: Retailers, manufacturers, wholesalers, financial institutions and other businesses demand air duct cleaning services.
Households employ air duct cleaning service providers.
Government bodies such as the US Congress and executive agencies use air duct cleaning services.
Not-for-profit associations operate and maintain their own facilities.

products_and_services.product_or_service: Ventilation Duct and Hood Cleaning Services
products_and_services.product_description: Since the primary function of this industry is to clean air ducts.
Other services include pest extermination and control.
Many air duct cleaning companies remove soot, debris and creosote buildup from chimneys.
Gutters ensure the safe flow of water throughout the exterior of a building.

demand_determinants.determinant_description: Consumer spending measures the total amount Americans spend on services.

barriers_points.barrier_description: Air duct cleaning manufacturers only need to purchase an office space.
Licensing requirements and certifications vary by state.

basis_points.basis_description: High internal competition gives households and companies the ability to compete on prices.

cost_factors.cost_factor_description: Rising interest rates have constrained profit.

capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_title: Low rate of new patent technologies
capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_description: The rate of new patent technologies entering the industry is low.

volatility_points.volatility_description: Low interest rates boost demand, while high rates constrain demand.

technological_change_points.technological_change_description: Many companies provide chimney cleaning using tools.

FAQs.question: What are the key questions for owners in this industry?
FAQs.answer: The key questions are about the level of regulation and assistance in the industry.

FAQs.question: What data is provided in the industry data table?
FAQs.answer: The table provides yearly data from 2005 to 2016 on revenue and other key metrics.
